Package.name: CFE_FS
Package.shortDescription: NASA Core Flight System File Services

Enumeration.label: ES_ERLOG
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Exception/Reset Log File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_WRITE_ERLOG_CC \ES_WRITEERLOG2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_SYSLOG
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services System Log File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_WRITE_SYSLOG_CC \ES_WRITESYSLOG2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_QUERYALL
Enumeration.shortDescription: Executive Services Information on All Applications File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Information on All Applications File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_QUERY_ALL_CC \ES_WRITEAPPINFO2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_PERFDATA
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Performance Analyzer Data File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_PERF_STOPDATA_CC \ES_STOPLADATA \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_SHELL
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Shell Response Data File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_SHELL_CMD_CC \ES_SHELL \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_CDS_REG
Enumeration.shortDescription: Executive Services Critical Data Store Registry Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Critical Data Store Registry Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_DUMP_CDS_REG_CC \ES_DUMPCDSREG \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: TBL_REG
Enumeration.LongDescription: Table Services Registry Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_TBL_DUMP_REG_CC \TBL_WRITEREG2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: TBL_IMG
Enumeration.LongDescription: Table Services Table Image File which is generated either on the ground or in response to a \link #CFE_TBL_DUMP_CC \TBL_DUMP \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: EVS_APPDATA
Enumeration.shortDescription: Event Services Application Data Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Event Services Application Data Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_EVS_FILE_WRITE_APP_DATA_CC \EVS_WRITEAPPDATA2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: EVS_EVENTLOG
Enumeration.shortDescription: Event Services Local Event Log Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Event Services Local Event Log Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_EVS_FILE_WRITE_LOG_DATA_CC \EVS_WRITELOG2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: SB_PIPEDATA
Enumeration.shortDescription: Software Bus Pipe Data Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Software Bus Pipe Data Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_SB_SEND_PIPE_INFO_CC \SB_WRITEPIPE2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: SB_ROUTEDATA
Enumeration.shortDescription: Software Bus Message Routing Data Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Software Bus Message Routing Data Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_SB_SEND_ROUTING_INFO_CC \SB_WRITEROUTING2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: SB_MAPDATA
Enumeration.shortDescription: Software Bus Message Mapping Data Dump File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Software Bus Message Mapping Data Dump File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_SB_SEND_MAP_INFO_CC \SB_WRITEMAP2FILE \endlink command.

Enumeration.label: ES_QUERYALLTASKS
Enumeration.shortDescription: Executive Services Query All Tasks Data File
Enumeration.LongDescription: Executive Services Query All Tasks Data File which is generated in response to a \link #CFE_ES_QUERY_ALL_TASKS_CC \ES_WRITETASKINFO2FILE \endlink command.

ContainerDataType.name: Header
ContainerDataType.shortDescription: Standard cFE File header structure definition

ContainerDataType.name: FileObject
ContainerDataType.shortDescription: Encapsulates a CFE file header and data
